name: m3u-editor
description: M3U Editor is a web-based tool for editing and managing M3U playlists. Useful for IPTV and media streaming setups, it allows sorting, filtering, and customizing entries for media players.
features: Playlist editing: Import and modify M3U/M3U8 playlists with drag-and-drop reordering for IPTV and media streaming.
Channel filtering: Search and filter entries by name, group, or URL to quickly locate specific streams.
Bulk operations: Apply changes to multiple entries at once, including deletion, grouping, and metadata updates.
EPG integration: Link electronic program guide data to channels for enhanced viewing information.
Export options: Save edited playlists in multiple formats compatible with various media players.
Group management: Organize channels into custom categories for easier navigation and access.
Duplicate detection: Identify and remove duplicate entries to keep playlists clean and efficient.
URL validation: Check stream URLs for availability and responsiveness before saving.
Backup and restore: Create playlist backups to prevent data loss during editing sessions.
Multi-format support: Handle various playlist formats including M3U, M3U8, and XSPF files.
